name: Minneapolis
description: Minneapolis is the largest city in Minnesota and a major center for commerce, culture, and healthcare in the Upper Midwest.

name: St. Paul
description: St. Paul is the capital of Minnesota and forms the Twin Cities metropolitan area with Minneapolis.

name: Rochester
description: Rochester is home to the world-renowned Mayo Clinic and is a major medical center in the Midwest.

name: Duluth
description: Duluth is a port city on Lake Superior known for its maritime heritage and natural beauty.

name: Bloomington
description: Bloomington is home to the Mall of America and is a major retail and entertainment destination.
